Accessibility Statement

Our commitment to digital accessibility and inclusive design for all users.

Our Commitment

Headen Tech Solutions is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. We continually improve the user experience for everyone and apply the relevant accessibility standards.

Conformance Status

This website strives to conform to WCAG 2.1 AA standards. We have implemented the following accessibility features:

  • Semantic HTML structure with proper heading hierarchy
  • Alternative text for images and visual content
  • Keyboard navigation support throughout the site
  • Sufficient color contrast ratios (4.5:1 minimum)
  • Focus indicators for interactive elements
  • Skip-to-content links for screen readers
  • Form labels and error messaging
  • Responsive design for various screen sizes

Keyboard Navigation

This website can be navigated using only a keyboard. Use the following keys:

  • Tab: Move forward through interactive elements
  • Shift + Tab: Move backward through interactive elements
  • Enter: Activate links and buttons
  • Space: Activate buttons and checkboxes
  • Arrow Keys: Navigate within menus and lists

Screen Reader Support

This website is designed to work with screen readers and other assistive technologies. We use semantic HTML, proper ARIA labels, and descriptive text to ensure content is accessible to users with visual impairments.

Color and Contrast

We maintain sufficient color contrast ratios throughout the website. Text and background combinations meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards with a minimum contrast ratio of 4.5:1 for normal text and 3:1 for large text.

Forms and Interactive Elements

All forms include proper labels and error messaging. Interactive elements have:

  • Clear, descriptive labels
  • Error messages that identify the problem
  • Instructions for completing forms
  • Visible focus indicators

Known Limitations

While we strive to make this website fully accessible, we acknowledge that there may be areas for improvement. We are continuously working to enhance accessibility and welcome feedback from users.

Feedback and Accommodations

If you encounter accessibility barriers or need accommodations, please contact us. We are committed to providing alternative formats and assistance as needed.

Email: consulting@headentechsolutions.com

Response Time: We typically respond within 24 hours

Testing and Evaluation

We regularly test this website using automated accessibility tools and manual testing methods. Our testing includes:

  • Automated accessibility scanning tools
  • Keyboard-only navigation testing
  • Screen reader compatibility testing
  • Color contrast verification
  • User testing with people with disabilities

Ongoing Improvements

We are committed to continuous improvement of our website's accessibility. This includes regular updates, user feedback integration, and staying current with accessibility best practices and standards.

Last Updated: December 2024
